typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadDeleteActionTasks
ReadDeleteActionTasks select(mapColumn(
		{$id} = Name),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> IdSelection
IdSelection derive({$metadata.$model} = 'dtmi:ActionTask;1',
	{$entityDelete} = 'true') ~> ModelDefinition
ModelDefinition sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['tmp_ActionTasks.v1.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteToTempRepo
source(output(
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadTempStatusActionTasksStatusEditor
ReadDeleteActionTasks select(mapColumn(
		Name),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StatusColumnSelectionActionTasksStatusEditor
ReadTempStatusActionTasksStatusEditor, StatusColumnSelectionActionTasksStatusEditor exists(ReadTempStatusActionTasksStatusEditor@Name == StatusColumnSelectionActionTasksStatusEditor@Name,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> StatusUpdateActionTasksStatusEditor
StatusUpdateActionTasksStatusEditor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ActionTasks_status.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteTempStatusStatusUpdateActionTasksStatusEditor
source(output(
		ActionFamily as string,
		ActionTask as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true) ~> ReadTempStatusActionFamiliesActionTasksStatusEditor
ReadDeleteActionTasks select(mapColumn(
		Name),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StatusColumnSelectionActionFamiliesActionTasksStatusEditor
ReadTempStatusActionFamiliesActionTasksStatusEditor, StatusColumnSelectionActionFamiliesActionTasksStatusEditor exists(Name == ActionTask,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> StatusUpdateActionFamiliesActionTasksStatusEditor
StatusUpdateActionFamiliesActionTasksStatusEditor sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ActionFamiliesActionTasks_status.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WriteTempStatusStatusUpdateActionFamiliesActionTasksStatusEditor
